name: Invalid An active Staff attempts to create and grades a new assignment without a mandatory field

steps.name: Given  User sets Authorization to No Auth
Given  User sets a POST Request to valid base URL and valid end point
When  User create a POST request to to create and grades a new assignment without a mandatory field by active staff  from "POSTAssignment" and 12
Then  The response status code should be "404"
